title: RTAC Holding Schema
description: Real Time Availability Check (RTAC) holding details

id.description: The FOLIO id of the holding (item)

barcode.description: Unique inventory control number for physical resources, used largely for circulation purposes

locationCode.description: The location code of the holding

locationId.description: The location id of the holding

callNumber.description: The call number of the holding

status.description: The availability status of the holding

dueDate.description: The date when the holding will be available

temporaryLoanType.description: Name of the temporary loan type for a given item

permanentLoanType.description: Name of the default loan type for a given item

materialType.description: Define what type of thing the item is

suppressFromDiscovery.description: Indicate if record should not be displayed in a discovery system

totalHoldRequests.description: The total number of requested items for the patron

holdingsStatements.description: Notes about action, copy, binding etc.

statement.description: Name of the holdings note type
Textual description of the holdings of indexes

note.description: Note attached to a holdings statement

statement.description: Textual description of the holdings of supplementary material

note.description: Note attached to a holdings statement

holdingsCopyNumber.description: Piece ID (usually barcode) for systems that do not use holdings record

itemCopyNumber.description: Copy number is the piece identifier. The copy number reflects if the library has a copy of a single-volume monograph; a copy of a multi-volume, (e.g. Copy 1, or C.7.)
